root.name: Aliens: A Comic Book Adventure
root.description: You play as Lt. Col. Hericksen, one of four crew members, waking up from cryogenic sleep on the USS Sheridan after receiving a distress call from a mining colony, planet B54-C. As your team gets down to business you quickly realize that things are worse than anyone could have ever imagined.The game was distributed on two discs and featured pre-rendered 3D environments mixed with comic book style 2D characters during the point-and-click gameplay sequences. During combat it changed to a grid-based isometric view. The dialogue was fully voiced.
